trans-unit.source: Represents an adjustable arrow-shaped line cap.
trans-unit.target: 表示可調整的箭號形狀的線條端點。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.AdjustableArrowCap" /> class with the specified width and height.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的寬度和高度，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.AdjustableArrowCap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The width of the arrow.
trans-unit.target: 箭號的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the arrow.
trans-unit.target: 箭號的高度。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.AdjustableArrowCap" /> class with the specified width and height.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的寬度和高度，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.AdjustableArrowCap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The arrow end caps created with this constructor are always filled.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式 (Constructor) 建立的箭端永遠是填滿的。

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.AdjustableArrowCap> object named `myArrow`.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.AdjustableArrowCap>名為物件`myArrow`。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> object named `capPen`, and sets its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.CustomStartCap%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.CustomEndCap%2A> properties equal to `myArrow`.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Pen>名為物件`capPen`，並設定其<xref:System.Drawing.Pen.CustomStartCap%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Pen.CustomEndCap%2A>屬性等於`myArrow`。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawLine%2A> method to draw to screen a line capped by two arrows.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawLine%2A>繪製畫面上兩個箭號受限於一條線的方法。

trans-unit.source: The width of the arrow.
trans-unit.target: 箭號的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the arrow.
trans-unit.target: 箭號的高度。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to fill the arrow cap; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要填滿箭端，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.AdjustableArrowCap" /> class with the specified width, height, and fill property.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的寬度、高度和填色屬性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.AdjustableArrowCap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Whether an arrow end cap is filled depends on the argument passed to the <paramref name="isFilled" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 是否填滿箭端取決於傳遞至 <paramref name="isFilled" /> 參數的引數。

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.AdjustableArrowCap> object named `myArrow`.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.AdjustableArrowCap>名為物件`myArrow`。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> object named `capPen`, and sets its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.CustomStartCap%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.CustomEndCap%2A> properties equal to `myArrow`.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Pen>名為物件`capPen`，並設定其<xref:System.Drawing.Pen.CustomStartCap%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Pen.CustomEndCap%2A>屬性等於`myArrow`。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawLine%2A> method to draw to screen a line capped by two arrows.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawLine%2A>繪製畫面上兩個箭號受限於一條線的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the arrow cap is filled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定箭端是否填滿。

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if the arrow cap is filled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要填滿箭端，則這個屬性為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the arrow cap.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定箭端的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the arrow cap.
trans-unit.target: 箭端的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the arrow cap is scaled by the width of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> object used to draw the line being capped.
trans-unit.target: 箭號端的高度就更能調整的寬度，由<xref:System.Drawing.Pen>物件，用來繪製線條的上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are drawing a capped line with a pen that has a width of 5 pixels, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.AdjustableArrowCap> object has a height of 3, then the actual arrow cap is drawn 15 pixels high.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果要使用畫筆繪製 capped 的線條的寬度為 5 像素，而<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.AdjustableArrowCap>物件的高度是 3，則實際的箭號 cap 繪製 15 像素高。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of units between the outline of the arrow cap and the fill.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定箭端外框和填色之間的單位數。

trans-unit.source: The number of units between the outline of the arrow cap and the fill of the arrow cap.
trans-unit.target: 箭端外框和箭端填色之間的單位數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the arrow cap.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定箭端的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The width, in units, of the arrow cap.
trans-unit.target: 箭端的寬度 (以單位計算)。

trans-unit.source: The width of the arrow cap is scaled by the width of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> object used to draw the line being capped.
trans-unit.target: 箭號端點的寬度就更能調整的寬度，由<xref:System.Drawing.Pen>物件，用來繪製線條的上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are drawing a capped line with a pen that has a width of 5 pixels, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.AdjustableArrowCap> object has a width of 3, then the actual arrow cap is drawn 15 pixels wide.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果要使用畫筆繪製 capped 的線條的寬度為 5 像素，而<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.AdjustableArrowCap>物件的寬度為 3，則實際的箭號 cap 繪製 15 像素寬。
